name: Goodbye, Sunshine
description:
Magnolia’s only friend is the grief she carries. With her tiny backpack, one self-help book, and a lot of confusion, she sets on a journey to a fallen star with resurrecting powers.

Is Magnolia going crazy from grief, or is the world around her a bit strange?

This game was developed in five months under the guidance of Gianluca Pandolfo within Bauhaus Gamefabrik at Bauhaus University 2023.

This is a demo. Full game coming soon.

Controls instructions to avoid inconvenience: 

  • K - interact with NPCs/objects
  • I - open/close inventory
  • ESC - pause game/close inventory/illustration
  • M - continue dialogue 
  • ENTER - choose the dialogue option

Credits:
